sentences.sContent: Malicious users can use this information to reconnoiter the naming schema in your organization and attack key infrastructure services.
sentences.sContent_eng: Malicious users can use this information to reconnoiter the naming schema in your organization and attack key infrastructure services.
sentences.sCn: 恶意用户可以使用这个信息来侦察您的组织机构的名计划，并攻击关键基本设施服务。

sentences.sContent: Except the method of nature electric field, we used DB-3 popular dam seepage detection device of flow field method to reconnoiter around Jiangya dam site.
sentences.sContent_eng: Except the method of nature electric field, we used DB-3 popular dam seepage detection device of flow field method to reconnoiter around Jiangya dam site.
sentences.sCn: 在对江垭水库大坝物探勘查工作中，除运用了自然电场法等常规查漏方法外，还采用了流场法DB-3普及型堤坝渗漏检测仪进行勘查。

remMethod.val: re + connoiter (观察， 源自法语) → 侦察
